name: Stacked diffs for fast-moving code review with Graphite co-founders Tomas Reimers & Greg Foster (The Changelog #491)
summary: This week we’re peeking into the future again — this time we’re looking at the future of modern code review and workflows around pull requests. Jerod and Adam were joined by two of the co-founders of Graphite — Tomas Reimers and Greg Foster. Graphite is an open-source CLI and code review dashboard built for engineers w...
